A New Site

Jun 10, 2014

It’s always a combination of exactly two things that make me want to update a website: 1) the development of a large or small life change, and 2) the desire to procrastinate from a larger and more scary task at hand. In this case, it was me finally being able to publicly announce that I’ll be working on To the Best of Our Knowledge starting in September, and the fact that I have an essay due for a proposed book collection soon. With that in mind, I’m moving to this new set-up, which is powered by Jekyll and run from GitHub. I’ll be working on moving my old Tumblr posts into this format sometime over the next few days, once I can figure out how to get certain functions to work a litte better.

As always, thanks for reading.
